billhistory.lastaction: 02/23/2017 H Referred to State Affairs: Feb 23 2017 11:53AM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the enforcement by certain governmental entities of state and federal laws governing immigration and to the duties of law enforcement agencies concerning certain arrested persons.
billhistory.authors: Geren | Workman | Kuempel | Bonnen, Dennis | Simmons
billhistory.coauthors: Bell | Bohac | Bonnen, Greg | Burns | Capriglione | Dale | Goldman | Hefner | Holland | Isaac | Keough | King, Phil | Metcalf | Murphy | Oliverson | Springer | Wilson | Wray
billhistory.companions: SB 4 by Perry, Identical | HB 611 by Leach, Duplicate | HB 754 by Fallon, Duplicate | HB 1308 by Holland, Duplicate
